titles.title: Memorializing the unborn by lowering the United States flag to half-staff on the 22d day of January each year.
Memorializing the unborn by lowering the United States flag to half-staff on the 22d day of January each year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution supports the recognition of January 22 each year as the Day of Tears in the United States, and encourages citizens to lower their flags to half-staff to memorialize the unborn.
